channel.title: TV666 | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: As a professional sex worker and pod caster my shows focus on the darker side of love and relationships. Not in the sense of bad, yet rather in the sense of "good..." What I mean by this is we will be taking a deep look at what so many seem to consider odd or weird in terms of sex and sensuality. An adult show with a twist... I swear for a living... That is not what this is about. So while we will be talking about sex, love, relationships, men and women, bdsm, so called kink and more, really what we will be doing is holding an adult dialog on these topics. oh... one other thing we will be doing... We will also be having a heck of a lot of fun. After all... its my show. I get to do it my way. Cool, huh?

item.title: The Darker Side Of Love - Jul 19,2009
item.description:
How good is an orgasm? ok. A trick question since we're going to follow it up with and how good is a better orgasm? What is it you do to have a better orgasm? We have email on the topic from some of my clients, plus we will be having a special guest visit the show and talk a bit with us about their orgasms and what they do to enjoy a better climax. Note: The show is adult in nature. I'm a highly sexual being. A submissive to Women and an Alpha when it comes to lads... I'm straight yet well over half my clients are men... I know the turf and I also know... We can all learn more by sharing... Offer your thoughts about better orgasms and more intense sexual fun... how to... why... etc. tonight on The Darker Side Of Love. Listener discretion is advised. I'm a lucky SOB. Plugged into the underground scene and someone who sort of "gets around..." some... As is the case I'm pulling no punches on The Darker Side. Nope. We're opening show 001 with Seattle's own mother of mayhem... Our lady of lovin' Allena Gabosch. AG runs a local "Sex Club..." and is truly one sexy doll. If anyone knows about better orgasms, its Allena. I.. can tell ya that... *wink* - And tonight She's going to share some perspective on better orgasms... More climactic climaxing and just plain having more fun in your intimate times... Here on.. The Darker Side Of Love.
